data_sources.data_quality_notes: Comprehensive research conducted 2025-10-11. Data verified from SCE official program pages, CPUC decisions, and regulatory filings. Note: Exact current incentive rates subject to CPUC approval following October 2024 resolution requiring recalculation.

maximum_savings_100.description: 100% cycling - A/C compressor shut off 100% of time during events
maximum_savings_100.notes: Up to $145/year per unit - rates subject to CPUC approval and may change

good_value_50.description: 50% cycling - A/C compressor shut off 15 min per 30 min during events

maximum_comfort_30.description: 30% cycling - A/C compressor shut off 9 min per 30 min during events

capacity_rate.rate_status: Subject to change by CPUC. October 2024 CPUC resolution required SCE to resubmit incentive rates with corrected PRM adder (reduced from 9% to 0%)

performance_rate.notes: No performance-based payments. Credits are capacity-based (annual participation) not event-based performance.

call_windows.description: Events can occur year-round, 24 hours per day, 7 days per week
call_windows.notes: No specific call window restrictions. CAISO or SCE Grid Control Center can call events at any time based on grid needs.

seasons.notes: Credits are applied to bills June 1 - October 1, but events can occur year-round
Events can be called any time of year, 24/7

customer_classes.size_threshold_notes: Businesses of any size eligible. Must be on qualifying Commercial & Industrial rates.

eligibility.minimum_capacity_kw: not specified - based on A/C unit size

minimum_usage_requirement.notes: Must use minimum 0.2 kWh per A/C ton during events to remain eligible

eligibility.meter_requirements: Edison SmartConnect or interval data meter required
incompatible_programs: Time of Use Base Interruptible Program (TOU-BIP)
additional_requirements: Must be in SCE service territory
Central A/C must be in good working order
Tenants must obtain property owner approval

event_parameters.event_can_occur: 24 hours per day, 7 days per week, year-round

cycling_details.maximum_savings_100: A/C compressor shut off 100% of time during event
cycling_details.good_value_50: A/C compressor cycles: 15 minutes off per 30 minutes
cycling_details.maximum_comfort_30: A/C compressor cycles: 9 minutes off per 30 minutes

notification.notification_notes: Courtesy alerts are optional. Participants can choose to receive notifications for event scheduling, event start, and event end. Event status also viewable at sce.com/drp/events
notification.notification_timing: not specified - participants should not rely on notifications as events can be called at any time

event_triggers.trigger_description: Events are called based on grid reliability needs and market conditions. The California Independent System Operator (CAISO) may request electricity reduction, or SCE Grid Control Center may call events based on operational needs.
secondary_triggers: SCE Grid Control Center load reduction needs
event_triggers.price_threshold: not specified - high wholesale energy prices mentioned but no specific threshold

nomination_bidding.notes: Direct load control program - no bidding required. SCE controls A/C units directly via installed device.

failure_to_meet_minimum_usage.trigger: Failure to use minimum 0.2 kWh per A/C ton during events

early_withdrawal.early_withdrawal_allowed: Yes, but cannot re-enroll for 12 months
early_withdrawal.exception: Medical reasons may allow earlier withdrawal after 1-year minimum

inoperable_equipment.consequence: Removal from program if A/C becomes inoperable

penalties.non_performance_penalty: Removal from program and 12-month re-enrollment ban if minimum usage requirement not met
penalties.measurement_period: Annual review conducted by January 31 each year

enrollment_details.installation_cost: Free - SCE installs remote-controlled device at no cost
enrollment_details.plan_changes: Can only downgrade cycling option once per 12 months
enrollment_details.cancellation_policy: Can cancel after 12-month minimum. Cannot re-enroll for 12 months after de-enrollment.

historical_events.notes: Event status can be viewed at sce.com/drp/events during active events

caiso_market_integration.market_bidding: SCE bids SDP resources into CAISO market
caiso_market_integration.implementation_timeline: Transition to CAISO PDR model occurred 2011-2014
caiso_market_integration.notes: Third-party Demand Response Providers with market-integrated PDR can participate. SCE acts as scheduling coordinator for direct retail participants.

october_2024_resolution.action: CPUC directed SCE to resubmit incentive rates via Tier 2 Advice Letter
october_2024_resolution.reason: Original AL 5237-E rates denied due to incorrect PRM adder calculation
october_2024_resolution.required_changes: Reduce Planning Reserve Margin (PRM) adder from 9% to 0%
october_2024_resolution.policy_adder: Commercial customer incentive percent change to match residential percent change
october_2024_resolution.expected_impact: Approximately 11% decrease from current incentive levels
october_2024_resolution.status: Awaiting new advice letter submission (due within 30 days of October 17, 2024)

integration_metadata.notes: High-quality data obtained from authoritative sources. Program well-documented by SCE. Main limitation: Exact current incentive dollar amounts subject to pending CPUC approval following October 2024 resolution requiring rate recalculation. Historical rates ($145/$50/$10 per year per unit) documented but may change. All other program parameters verified from primary sources.
data_gaps: Exact resubmitted incentive rates (pending CPUC approval post-Oct 2024)
Specific event frequency statistics or historical event data
key_findings: Direct load control program for commercial/industrial A/C cycling
Three cycling options with capacity-based annual payments per A/C unit
Year-round event availability (24/7) with 180 hour annual maximum
Integrated with CAISO wholesale market via PDR model
Recent regulatory activity (Oct 2024) affecting incentive rates
Minimum usage requirement of 0.2 kWh per A/C ton to maintain eligibility
Free installation and participation, 1-year minimum commitment
Cannot participate simultaneously with CBP, TOU-BIP, or CPP programs
